newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: New Zealand city weather forecasts for Wednesday.
newsitem.headline: New Zealand city weather forecasts for Wednesday.

text.p: Auckland moderate NW mostly fine some light rain 14
Hamilton moderate NW cloud increasing some light rain 14
Napier/Hastin moderate N mostly fine high cloud 15
New Plymouth moderate NW cloudy some rain 13
Wellington fresh NW cloudy rain easing 13
Greymouth/Hok moderate W some rain rain easing 11
Christchurch variable winds high cloud high cloud 14
Dunedin SW change risk of rain showers clearing 11
Queenstown gusty SW rain easing few showers 7
Invercargill fresh SW some rain showers 8
